mapper.select: select rel.ID rel_id, t.id team_id, t.NAME, t.DESCR, t.NUM, t.END_TIME, t.ONLINE, (select count(*) from team_user_rel r where r.TEAM_ID = t.id) en_num from team_user_rel rel left join team_info t on t.id = rel.TEAM_ID where rel.USER_ID = #{userId}
select rel.*, user.USER_NAME name from team_user_rel rel left join user on user.id = rel.USER_ID where rel.TEAM_ID = #{teamId}
